scene_end_anchor: Artie retreated until he was cornered against an ancient oak tree by a Level 1 Lesser Forest Slime. He drew his Keyring as a makeshift weapon to defend himself. The slime launched its first attack as Artie dropped into a desperate combat stance.
constraints: Artie's HP is permanently locked at 1/1.
Artie is holding his Keyring (ITEM_KEYS_001) in his hand_right.
Artie is cornered against an ancient oak tree in the Whispering Woods.
The System confirmed the [Fragile] status and 1/1 HP cap.
next_action: Artie attempts to fight the Lesser Forest Slime using his Keyring while avoiding any damage.

last_scene: Artie and Fizz arrived in the Whispering Woods, where Artie immediately felt the lethal weight of his 1 HP build.
A Level 1 Lesser Forest Slime ambushed them, forcing Artie to retreat until he was cornered against an ancient oak tree.
With no other options, he drew his keyring as a makeshift weapon, preparing for a desperate first combat.
chapter_so_far: Artie Penhaligon died in a mundane office accident.
The System has intercepted Artie's soul for character creation.
Artie finalized a 'glass cannon' build with 1 HP and 100% Crit Rate.
Artie and Fizz have entered the first tutorial zone, the Whispering Woods.
Artie arrived in the Whispering Woods and encountered his first enemy, a Level 1 Slime.
key_facts_ring: Artie's consciousness transitioned to the Character Creation Suite.

Artie's HP is 0 and his current status is Deceased.
Artie accidentally allocated 100 attribute points to Critical Hit Rate due to a nervous spasm.
Artie confirmed his build, resulting in his HP being capped at 1/1.
The System awarded Artie the 'Crit or Quit' title, making all hits guaranteed crits but all damage fatal.
Fizz pulled her Standard Guide's Manual from her satchel as they transitioned to the physical world.
Artie and Fizz were deployed to the Whispering Woods tutorial zone.
A low growl from the thicket signaled the presence of a nearby monster.
